channel.title: Comments on: Read data on Mirror to prevent production database stress
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.content:encoded:
Just keep in mind that you will need to pay for a license if you do read from the mirror.

If you just use the mirror to be a hot standby you don’t need a license for the mirror even if you fail over as long as you fix your primary box within 30 days and then do all your stuff on that box again
